snippet: A report by a writers’ organization urges a dialogue on how students’ demands for more equitable and inclusive campuses do, or don’t, infringe on free speech....
abstract: PEN America publishes report examining state of free speech at college campuses across America; study, which warns that many young people may perceive free speech is used as weapon against them, urges constructive dialogue between student activists and free-speech advocates.
lead_paragraph: A report by a writers’ organization urges a dialogue on how students’ demands for more equitable and inclusive campuses do, or don’t, infringe on free speech.

headline.main: Can Cries of ‘Free Speech’ Be a Weapon? Students Say Yes
headline.print_headline: PEN Warns of Students’ Seeing ‘Free Speech’ as a Cudgel

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Knight, John S and James L, Foundation
